item.title: Automapper 学习笔记
item.author: 作者
item.description: 本文基于 Automapper 9.0.0 诊断 Automapper 的属性映射过程 1 2 3 4 5 var cfg = new MapperConfigurationExpression(); cfg.CreateMap<TypeB, TypeA>(); var configuration = new MapperConfiguration(cfg); var executionPlan = configuration.BuildExecutionPlan(typeof(TypeB), typeof(TypeA)); 最关键的一行代码 var executionPlan = configuration.BuildExecutionPlan(typeof(TypeB), typeof(TypeA));，此时查看
